nodes.title: The Emma
nodes.description: Timeless yet full of modern brilliance, The Emma is a side stone engagement ring designed to captivate. A stunning hidden halo adds a touch of radiance beneath the center stone, while a delicate arrangement of round and marquise-cut diamonds along the band creates a graceful, shimmering effect. The combination of classic beauty and intricate detailing makes The Emma an extraordinary choice for those who love elegance with a touch of unexpected sparkle.

optionsFromMetafields.value: {"Center Stone Shape":["Round","Oval","Pear","Cushion","Elongated Cushion","Emerald","Radiant","Princess","Marquise","Asscher"],"Material":["14k White Gold","14k Yellow Gold","14k Rose Gold","18k White Gold","18k Yellow Gold","18k Rose Gold","Platinum"]}

nodes.title: Double Prongs
nodes.descriptionHtml: Similar to the single claw prongs but two prongs sit closely next to each other for extra protection.

nodes.title: Two-Tone
nodes.descriptionHtml: Create a unique look by mixing two metals. The head will be made in white gold and the band in your chosen metal.

nodes.title: Euro Shank
nodes.descriptionHtml: A modern squared base for comfortable, stylish wear.

nodes.title: Pave Prongs
nodes.descriptionHtml: Add extra sparkle to your setting with diamonds on the prongs.

nodes.title: Low Profile
nodes.descriptionHtml: The center stone is set close to the band, offering a sleek and practical design. A straight wedding band won’t fit with the ring.

nodes.title: 6 Prongs (Round)
nodes.descriptionHtml: Add extra protection to the center stone with 6 prongs.

nodes.title: Remove Hidden Halo
nodes.descriptionHtml: Remove the feature of smaller diamonds underneath the center stone (The setting design won’t change).

nodes.title: East West
nodes.descriptionHtml: Turn the center stone horizontally for a fresh, unique look.

nodes.title: Compass
nodes.descriptionHtml: A compass prong setting has four prongs aligned with the cardinal directions, highlighting the stone's beauty.

nodes.title: Bezel
nodes.descriptionHtml: A bezel setting surrounds the stone with a metal rim, providing a secure and modern look.

nodes.title: The Stella
nodes.description: Capture the romance of a bygone era with The Stella. Its smooth bezel setting provides security and style to the center stone while the wide band accentuates its sleek profile and timeless appeal. Robust yet alluring, The Stella makes a statement that feels at once classic and modern: an ideal choice for marking the moment you say “yes."

nodes.title: Euro Shank
nodes.descriptionHtml: A modern squared base for comfortable, stylish wear.

nodes.title: Tapered
nodes.descriptionHtml: A sleek, modern twist with a narrowing band that accentuates the center stone.

nodes.title: East West
nodes.descriptionHtml: Turn the center stone horizontally for a fresh, unique look.

nodes.title: Reverse Tapered
nodes.descriptionHtml: Bold elegance with a widening band that creates a captivating and distinctive look.

nodes.title: The Pave Liv
nodes.description: The sparkle and brilliance of The Pave Liv are absolutely endless. Quality craftsmanship, Deco sensibilities, and timeless aesthetics meet in this pave, three-stone tapered baguette engagement ring. The side baguettes add size, sparkle, and geometry to the side stone. Designed to shine in all directions while turning heads.

nodes.title: The Pave Skyler
nodes.description: Meet The Pave Skyler, a bold take on elegance. This bypass engagement ring features a sweeping silhouette that wraps the center diamond in a graceful, modern embrace. The pavé band adds just the right touch of shimmer, with diamonds set closely together for nonstop sparkle. It’s a striking choice for someone who wants classic brilliance with a fresh, unexpected shape.

nodes.title: The Pave Maia
nodes.description: The pave Maia blends timeless elegance with practicality. Its delicate pave wraps gently around the finger, leading into a hidden halo. Small diamonds add interest and sparkle from every angle while highlighting your center stone. Its low profile makes for effortless and elegant wear.

nodes.title: The Pave Lily
nodes.description: Embrace the enchantment of nature's beauty with The Pave Lily engagement ring. The band, adorned with a shimmering pave setting, serves as a luxurious pathway leading to the centerpiece. As if plucked from a fairy tale garden, a diamond-set floral motif graces the bridge, adding a touch of whimsy and elegance that sets this ring apart from any other. The Pave Lily is a poetic ode to nature, capturing the essence of blooming love and eternal commitment.

nodes.title: The Stephanie
nodes.description: Step into a more romantic era with The Stephanie, a vintage-style engagement ring that exquisitely captures the essence of the Belle Epoque. Featuring intricate milgrain detailing and a high profile, it beautifully compliments all center stones, highlighting their clarity and brilliance. Its elegant curves and detailed band are reminiscent of the intricate designs of the early 20th century, making it an ideal choice for those who are drawn to romance and nostalgia.

nodes.title: The Pave Luna
nodes.description: Introducing The Pave Luna, a mesmerizing engagement ring with shimmering petal prongs with exquisite round and marquise-cut diamonds. These delicately designed prongs not only secure the stone but also add a floral, romantic touch to the ring, reminiscent of a blooming flower under the moonlight. The pave band catches the light with every movement, creating a continuous sparkle that's both elegant and eye-catching.

nodes.title: The Aline
nodes.description: Make a bold statement of love with The Aline, a pave engagement ring designed to turn heads. The wide hidden halo elegantly surrounds four claw prongs, offering a luminous backdrop that amplifies the center stone’s sparkle. The pave band, adorned with shimmering diamonds, adds a layer of sophistication and glamor to this stunning design. Whether viewed up close or from afar, The Aline is a true showstopper—perfect for those who want their love to shine as brightly as their future.

nodes.title: The Pave Claire
nodes.description: The Pave Claire combines smooth sleekness with the gorgeous shine of a pave-lined band. Sparkle surrounds your finger as beautiful round brilliant diamonds make their way up the band and across the bridge, highlighting the center stone and adding flash and shine from every angle. Slip into pave perfection with The Claire wedding band to add yet another dimension of sparkle.

nodes.title: The Pave Lisa
nodes.description: The Pave Lisa marries elegance with intricate craftsmanship. This stunning piece features a shimmering pave band, adding a layer of brilliance that perfectly complements the unique marquise-cut diamonds nestled within each petal-like prong. These delicate marquise diamonds create a floral-inspired design, making the center stone appear as though it’s blooming with beauty and light. It’s a ring that captures the essence of love, leaving a lasting impression on the heart of its wearer.

nodes.title: The Sofia
nodes.description: The Sofia is a captivating engagement ring that brings elegance and uniqueness together in perfect harmony. Pavé-set diamonds sparkle along the band, catching the light with every movement. A distinctive scarf-shaped hidden halo enhances the brilliance of the center stone while double prongs deliver extra protection. The Sofia is a dream come true for those who adore subtle yet unforgettable details.

nodes.title: The Kayla
nodes.description: This gorgeous knife edge The Kayla engagement ring features twin rows of dazzling pave-set diamonds running semi-band. An additional bridge accent and a hidden halo in the gallery add brilliance to the piece. Four claw prongs hold the center stone, completing the stunning design.

nodes.title: Euro Shank
nodes.descriptionHtml: A modern squared base for comfortable, stylish wear.

nodes.title: Pave Prongs
nodes.descriptionHtml: Add extra sparkle to your setting with diamonds on the prongs.

nodes.title: 75% Around
nodes.descriptionHtml: Extend the diamonds on the band to go 75% around it.

nodes.title: All Around
nodes.descriptionHtml: Extend the diamonds on the band — all around.

nodes.title: 6 Prongs (Round)
nodes.descriptionHtml: Add extra protection to the center stone with 6 prongs.

nodes.title: Remove Hidden Halo
nodes.descriptionHtml: Remove the feature of smaller diamonds underneath the center stone (The setting design won’t change).

nodes.title: East West
nodes.descriptionHtml: Turn the center stone horizontally for a fresh, unique look.

nodes.title: Compass
nodes.descriptionHtml: A compass prong setting has four prongs aligned with the cardinal directions, highlighting the stone's beauty.

nodes.title: Reverse Tapered Pave
nodes.descriptionHtml: A striking fusion of contemporary allure and bold design, with intricately set diamonds along a widening band.

nodes.title: Tapered Pave
nodes.descriptionHtml: Delicately set diamonds along a gracefully narrowing band.

nodes.title: The Melissa
nodes.description: Experience the enchantment of The Melissa, a truly mesmerizing engagement ring that effortlessly captures hearts. This exquisite ring showcases a harmonious blend of round brilliant and marquise cut diamonds adorning the shoulders, creating a captivating and whimsical effect that is sure to leave her breathless. The contrast between the different diamond cuts adds depth and dimension while the sleek band beautifully complements the dazzling arrangement, ensuring that all eyes remain fixed on the ring's captivating beauty.

nodes.title: The Angelina
nodes.description: Twin rows of lustrous diamonds and gold meet to create a captivating split shank of The Angelina engagement ring. The intertwining band, gallery rail, and bridge areas are finely adorned with pave-set diamonds. Awe-inspiring & spectacular on the finger, the Angelina is head-turning but dainty and delicate.

nodes.title: The Pave Charlotte
nodes.description: With stunning shine and a smooth modern silhouette, The pave Charlotte brings the sleekness of the classic bevel to new heights. A gorgeous pave band makes way for a spectacular hidden halo. Just below, a diamond bridge lays under a unique peekaboo window highlighting the underside of your stone to let in light while surrounding it with sparkle from every angle. Striking on its own, the high setting is also ideal for future stacking or nesting closely with the perfect wedding band.

nodes.title: The Daisy
nodes.description: The Daisy is an enchanting nature-inspired side stone engagement ring that captures the essence of timeless romance. This exquisite ring is a true testament to the beauty of nature, featuring a hidden halo and shimmering micro-diamonds adorning the gracefully twisted band. Like delicate daisy petals glistening with morning dew, these accent diamonds enhance the center stone and create an ethereal sparkle that will leave her breathless.

nodes.title: The Serena
nodes.description: The Serena is a gorgeously delicate engagement ring studded with 4 VVS diamonds, gently leading your eye towards the center stone. Pave diamonds are set along the bridge and up each prong, giving stunning sparkle and adding a unique and exciting perspective from every angle.

nodes.title: The Lauren
nodes.description: Capture the essence of everlasting love with The Lauren, a breathtaking three-stone engagement ring designed to leave a lasting impression. At the heart of The Lauren are two flawless pear-cut diamonds delicately placed on the shoulders, beautifully complementing the center stone. Their sparkling perfection symbolizes the past, present, and future of your love story while the sleek and understated band adds a touch of modern simplicity, allowing the diamonds to shine brilliantly without distraction.

nodes.title: The Khloe
nodes.description: Make your proposal unforgettable with The Khloe, a stunning engagement ring designed to captivate. Rows of round-cut diamonds in a shared prong setting sparkle brilliantly along each shoulder, creating a dazzling display. A hidden halo encircles the basket, adding a subtle touch of brilliance that enhances the center stone's radiance. Floating above the accent stones and halo, the center diamond shows off its breathtaking beauty. The Khloe is more than a ring—it’s a radiant celebration of your love.

nodes.title: The Pave Crown Kamellie
nodes.description: With a stunning and timeless silhouette, The Pave Crown Kamellie takes the pave engagement ring to new heights. Sparkling pave diamonds enliven the delicate band with shimmering movement continuing up each prong leading to a hidden halo. A glittering basket of diamonds elevates the center stone, allowing light to enter and ensuring brilliant sparkle from every direction.

nodes.title: The Rebecca
nodes.description: The decadent Rebecca, a vintage-inspired engagement ring, combines contemporary antique design elements. Milgrain detailing decorates the tapered semi-band with graduated pave-set diamonds tapering down to the center stone. The ring is a low profile; practical for daily wear and draft lifestyles.
